name: Catch the dog
description:
Your dog have escaped from his room.

You can't let him to get his way.

Controls:

Move forward: W, up arrow or left mouse button;

Move backward: S, down arrow or right mouse button;

Move left: A or left arrow;

Move right: D or right arrow;

Jump: Space or enter;

Toggle cursor visibility: Escape or supr;

Pause the game: Control, alt, shift or tab;

Note: The online version is only a demo and many features aren't available. Please as possible, use an offline version instead. Edge and Safari browsers won't work.
